title: Taboomenu怎么设置点击需消耗青金石
author: jowi

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
加一个require-item节点就行了
require-item: 'material:lapis_lazuli;amount:数量'

replies.author: jowi
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-28 19:13
加一个require-item节点就行了
require-item: 'material:lapis_lazuli;amount:数量'
扣除不了 没对应物品 这就很神奇了。。

replies.author: jowi
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-28 19:13
加一个require-item节点就行了
require-item: 'material:lapis_lazuli;amount:数量'16:
  name: '&f青金石 &7*10'
  id: '351:4'
  amount: 10
  lore:
  - '&a回收价格 &c30 &a金币'
  required-item:
  - "hasName:false,hasLore:false,material:lapis_lazuli,amount:10"
  command:
  - 'console:eco give %player_name% 30'复制代码
